SA21n1408:2: ādau ca bhagavatyahaṅkāramavalambya om sumbha nisumbha hū hū phaṭ |
SA21n1408:3: om gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hū hū phaṭ |
SA21n1408:4: om gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hū hū phaṭ |
SA21n1408:5: om ānaya ho bhagavan vajra hū hū phaḍiti caturmukhamantrairdigbandhaṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe tryakṣareṇa bhūmimadhiṣṭhāya kuṅkumaraktacandanādisarāgasugandhidravyaiḥ om ā gā rā ḍe mā kā pre tri kā ka ra ka hi pra gu so lu ma ku |
SA21n1408:6: pūrvoktacaturmukhamantrāṇāmekaikamantroccāraṇapūrvakaṃ pūrvādiṣu vāmāvartena vāmahastena caturasraṃ maṇḍalaṃ kārayet |
SA21n1408:7: pū jā ityādi caturviṃśatyakṣarapīṭhopapīṭhakṣetropakṣetracchandohopacchandohamelāpakopamelāpaka śmaśānopaśmaśānoccāraṇamapi kartavyamiti kecidāmnāyavidaḥ |
SA21n1408:8: tato vāmakarānāmikāgre ṣaṭkoṇamaṇḍalamadhyavilasitavakāraṃ bahiḥ pūrvādidikkrameṇa vinirmitacatuḥ svastikaṃ vilikhya om vajrarekhe hū svāhā iti rekhāmākṛṣya om surekhe sarvatathāgatādhitiṣṭhantu svāheti rekhāmadhitiṣṭhet |
SA21n1408:9: tata ākrāntapādordhvadṛṣṭistu mūrdhnā pheṃkāranādato jvālāmudrāṃ baddhavā vāmāvartena bhrāmayet |
SA21n1408:10: jaḥ hū va hoḥ ityādi karṣaṇādimantrapuraḥ saramakaniṣṭhabhuvanavartinīṃ devīmākṛṣya praveśya baddhāṃ kṛtvā paritoṣayet |
SA21n1408:12: sya śmaśānasya madhye nṛtyantīṃ bhāvanayā abhimukhīkṛtya mantroddhārotthitahṛdayamantreṇaiva devīṃ raktavarṇakusumairarcayet |
SA21n1408:13: tataḥ om va ho yo hrī mo he hrī hra hra phaṭ iti mantraistryakṣaramantramilitaiḥ ṣaḍdevīsambodhanapādavidarbhitaiḥ ṣaṭkoṇeṣu ṣaḍdevīrarcayet |
SA21n1408:14: om āḥ nandyāvarta hū phaṭ iti nandyāvartānapi caturdikṣu pūjayet |
